ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-4-1-2 GET RECORDING CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get Recording Service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to Recording service Recording service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Recordings Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check that recording list is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that Configuration is present STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Get Recording Configuration (token = 'RecordingToken1') Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that the DUT returned Configuration STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Compare Recording Configurations Configurations are different Source information is different SourceId field is different ('http://any' when got via GetRecordings, 'http://any1' when got via GetRecordingConfiguration) Configurations don't match STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
